name: Closets
description:
(content warning: mentions domestic violence, loss, and death)

I've spent so much of my time in closets. Hiding from the world, violence, and seeking. In this interactive autobiography, explore my spaces of security and sanctuary.

Original Cover Photo by Lucas Clarysse

NOTE ON PRICING: I want my games to be accessible for as many people as possible! If $5 is more than you can spend, please contact me directly by emailing me (vnguyen@mica.edu).
